Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
In accordance with IMTAR – 21, Subpart C1, 21.C1.18, Subpart C2, 21.C2.9 & Subpart C3, 21.C3.1.20.
Part - I (Reference): Incident /Accident/ Snag / Explosive
a) Defect Report (DR) No: DR/2023/0176 b) Date of Occurrence: 09/12/2024
c) Installation Details: Kestrel Patrol - AC-6035-656 at
Maintenance Hub-X
Part - II: (Details of Defective Component)
a) Trade: Electrical b) Date Component 15/12/2024
Received:
c) System/Sub System: Power Distribution d) Main Assembly: Pylon-C
e) Nomenclature: Power Distribution Assembly Unit f) MOD Status: MOD-B
g) Part No.: EL-1392-Z6 h) Sl No.: SN-7899-162
i) Firmware Version: FW-3.62.971 j) Software Version: Not Applicable
k) Date of Installation: 11/07/2021 l) Date of Removal: 13/12/2024
Pg No: 81 Ln No: 1 Pg No: 45 Ln No: 16
m) Manufacturing Agency: Summit Defense Solutions n) Date, Month & Year February 2018
of Manufacturing:
o) Whether under warranty: No p) Whether under AMC No
/ Repair Contract:
q) Life completed since New: 1347 Hrs / 1633 Cycles

--- Page 2 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Battery thermal runaway indication. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Power Distribution component. Analysis
of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 10/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

--- Page 3 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part VI: Remarks by Quality Dept.
Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type.
Date: 11/01/2025 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer
Part VII: Remarks by User(Project):(if applicable)
Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection.
Date: 12/01/2025 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
Part VIII: Remarks by ORDAQA (Quality Aspects)
Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions.
Date: 14/01/2025 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni
Part IX: Remarks by CEMILAC / RCMA (Design Aspects)
Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable.
Date: 18/01/2025 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon
Edition Number: 1.0 Form Version Number: 1.0 Date: January 2021
